settings.cardHtml:
How the controls work
Button Condtions
If Weather Animate is on, demo controls are disabled (2nd row of controls except reset).
Stud Power
Turns stud output ON/OFF. If OFF, animations and colors wont display.
Animate
Starts/stops the current animation (demo pattern).
Weather Animate
Overrides demo pattern animation and this reflects todays weather in Auckland CBD.
Weather
Weather that is represented on the Monolith.
Change Color/Gradient Color
Applies a new color (or palette) to the active animation type.
Animation Type
Selects which effect runs. Changes apply when Animate is ON.
Speed in ms
Adjusts how fast the effect moves. 300ms as the fastest
Flip Direction
Reverses the animation direction (does not work in animation Empty Cycle and RGB Fade).
Axis
Switches orientation X and Y axis (not applicable to Empty Cycle, Sand Fall, and RGB Fade).
Backlight
Toggles the display backlight (does not affect stud output).
Reset
Resets controls to defaults.
Tip: If nothing changes, check System Status first.
